channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Download: hunting an asteroid, and unlocking the human mind
item.description: This is today’s edition of The Download, our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. Inside the m...

item.title: Saildrone completes NATO multi-domain demo in Baltic Sea
item.description: Four Saildrone Voyagers operated in both the Gulf of Finland and the western Baltic Sea, gathering data in challenging conditions. The post Saildrone ...

item.title: Why CISOs are making the SASE switch: Fewer vendors, smarter security, better AI guardrails
item.description: AI attacks are exposing gaps in multivendor stacks. CISOs are shifting to single-vendor SASE to consolidate, reduce risk and regain control.

item.title: New 1.5B router model achieves 93% accuracy without costly retraining
item.description: Katanemo Labs' new LLM routing framework aligns with human preferences and adapts to new models without retraining.

item.title: Circle’s stock should be worth less than half what it is now, analyst says
item.description: Mizuho’s Dan Dolev is the third analyst to make a bearish call on Circle Internet’s stock, with a price target that is nearly 60% below recent prices.

item.title: Here’s why Enphase and other solar stocks are tanking after Trump’s latest move
item.description: The maker of solar-power components saw its stock downgraded after Trump’s executive order enforcing a phaseout of tax credits.

item.title: Home sellers have gotten tired of cutting prices. So they’re yanking their houses off the market.
item.description: Home sellers in some of the nation’s worst housing markets are tired of cutting prices. So they’re pulling their listings.

item.title: I’m 85 with 2 kids and $4 million. My daughter wants a larger share of my estate than my son to compensate for unequal treatment by her father.
item.description: “My daughter has severe health issues — lymphoma, which is now in remission.”

item.title: No tax on Social Security? Not quite. What the tax megabill really means for seniors.
item.description: The enhanced standard deduction will offset what recipients pay in taxed benefits.

item.title: Battling next-gen financial fraud

item.title: How Capital One built production multi-agent AI workflows to power enterprise use cases
item.description: With over 100 million customers, Capital One's agentic system is built for scale and complexity.

item.title: Elon Musk’s ‘truth-seeking’ Grok AI peddles conspiracy theories about Jewish control of media
item.description: The chatbot is giving antisemitic responses and bizarre first-person replies, raising concerns about bias and safety ahead of Grok 4 launch.

item.title: Cracking AI’s storage bottleneck and supercharging inference at the edge
item.description: As AI applications permeate enterprise operations, a critical bottleneck often emerges: data storage.
